publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4391 Cathie Craigie: Congratulations to Baird Memorial Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and the teaching, domestic and janitorial staff at Baird Memorial Primary School in Condorrat, Cumbernauld, for working as a team to achieve an Eco Schools’ flag award; recognises the hard work and dedication shown by all those involved and particularly welcomes the fact that pupils are putting their new-found knowledge and skills into practice by living more eco-friendly lifestyles, and further recognises their excellent achievement in gaining Charter Mark status, a worthy recognition for the entire school community.
S2M-4391 Congratulations to Baird Memorial Primary School (lodged on 12 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4391 Congratulations to Baird Memorial Primary School (lodged on 12 May 2006) John Swinburne*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4391 Congratulations to Baird Memorial Primary School (lodged on 12 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4391 Congratulations to Baird Memorial Primary School (lodged on 12 May 2006) Scott Barrie*
